mainText:
I think it is very telling that I write this to you on a MacBook Pro,
which I think Steve would be proud of. We have lost a visionary, a
pioneer and an adventurer. Nothing will ever be quite the same again.
I never knew him but I am upset. He was such a revolutionary thinker
and he always had a new way to do things. My sincerest sympathies to
his family. He will not be forgotten. His legacy lives on in
technology that we all use and love using. I think he'd like that. He
saw what we should be doing and now, we're doing it! He was a
marvellous man!
author: Robert
